tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was infected with covid19 in April'21 & took the video consultation from Dr Meenu. I was a bit worried at that time due to the chaos everywhere and Covid 2nd wave had hit us really badly. However, the doctor polietly listened my symptoms & started the medications. My experience was really good as the doctor was responsive to my queries and i contacted her multiple times during my recovery period. She didn't recommend any unnecessary treatment or tests and I recovered well in 2weeks. * ***** *** *** ** *** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** ****

I took my mother to Dr. Meenu Virdi for health checkup as a second opinion for my mother's on going health problems.

Dr. Meenu Virdi is very friendly and have a very pleasing personality. She listened very patiently to my mother's problems and cheered her up. She also, explained all the medicines prescribed to my mother well. 

I would recommend Dr. Meenu Virdi to anyone who wants to get a better treatment of their ailments with a feel good factor.

*** ** * **** *********** ******* *** listens to her patients , give them time and understands their problem . *** ********** ** ******** she is always on the point. Never has she had any doubt . *** ***** *** ******** ********* ** *** ********** ** *** ************ ****** *******She is fully devoted in her field.*** ** *** ** *** **** ****** * **** ***** going to her gives me peace of my mind, i know i'm in safe hands.
I highly recommend her.

reply_text: Hi Ishant , it’s sad that you could not get any help with the prescribed medications. I would love to have you in follow up visit so as to understand what medications you were previously taking and what else is required for you as per your underlying condition. It’s really hard to believe that you were given same medications knowingly that you were taking those earlier for past 2 weeks ,  as no doctor would do that if a patient says that he/ she didn’t get relief from a particular set of medications. Unfortunately, I could not see your details in our recent records, so won’t be able to justify.

context: Facial Pain,Blood Pressure Changes,Low Blood Pressure,
review: ******* *********** *****  **** doctor has own lab she said that , she will give the lab contact number. please ignore this doctor
reply_text:
Dear patient, it’s sad that you had a hurtful experience with us. I do not believe in suggesting irrelevant tests and put all my heart into my work for the welfare of my patient. 
Secondly, we just have an OPD clinic and We don’t own any lab. If still some lab was suggested to you that would have been done for your convenience only just because there are many local labs operating in Chhattarpur area who do not even analyze the samples of patients. 
Moreover, My OPD is running good enough , so I really don’t need to look for other sources to generate money. 
It may be truth for you that this doctor should be ignored but not for many as they know us for the good work we have been doing for past many years. I wish you could have given a second thought before writing this feedback . Love and grace.
